mapper.select: SELECT emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del, hope_purchase_unit FROM t_emp_pool WHERE emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}

SELECT emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del, hope_purchase_unit FROM t_emp_pool WHERE name = #{name} and phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and del != 'Y'
SELECT * FROM t_emp_pool ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_emp_pool SET emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}, sourcing_manager = #{sourcing_manager}, name = #{name}, phonenumber = #{phonenumber}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, education = #{education}, school_name = #{school_name}, major = #{major}, career_years = #{career_years}, career_field = #{career_field}, career_level = #{career_level}, project_assign = #{project_assign}, del = #{del}, hope_purchase_unit = #{hope_purchase_unit} WHERE emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_emp_pool ( emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del, hope_purchase_unit ) VALUES ( DEFAULT, #{sourcing_manager}, #{name}, #{phonenumber}, #{birthdate}, #{email}, #{address}, #{education}, #{school_name}, #{major}, #{career_years}, #{career_field}, #{career_level}, 0, 'N', #{hope_purchase_unit} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_emp_pool t1 inner join t_emp_ledger t2 on t1.emp_pool_id = t2.emp_pool_id where t1.emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id} and t2.progress in ('투입예정', '투입') and (t2.del = 'N' or t2.del is null)
